thread.section_title: Hotel Eiffel Segur - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A little gem!
thread.title_full: A little gem! - Review of Hotel Eiffel Segur, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Marie B
title: A little gem!
text:
This hotel is a little gem! I stayed three nights at this lovely and well located place in Paris (quick access to the m√©tro, walking distance from the Eiffel Tower). A very pleasant experience from the helpful, friendly staff to the very cozy rooms.
If you are a traveler who appreciates charming and quiet environment with true professionals running it, I definitively recommend this hotel! I will come back for sure!
